title: Got low priority queue

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I played a FLEX 5V5 with a friend of mine which had rando's I didn't know and the minute the queue started I noticed there was a red triangle with a black exclamation point in the middle of it, thinking nothing of it I waited and played the game and won, however as soon as the game was over I noticed it didn't leave despite me not being in a lobby with these people. I researched it and found out that this is low priority queue even though I wasn't the one who received it my SOLO/DUO ranked games are being affected by it. How can I fix this? I've gotten 2 games in a row with exceptionally toxic people with a queue I don't deserve.

replies.body: After Upgrade, and before, my game would freeze at least one game out of 4 or 5 a night. never figured out why... but now I have a LPQ. I think I have had like 6 now, and there is no update as to how many of these I have to sit through.

I went ahead and checked you account, and there's no signs that you currently have a low priority queue. My best guess is that the friend you're grouped with DOES have an LPQ though. If you're queued for a match with someone who is in low priority queue, you will need to wait through that queue with them. 

Do me a favor and try q-ing up solo, and let me know if you still see the red triangle or not. If it's still there when you Q solo, take a screenshot and shoot it my way so I can look over this more!!
